ygData.subject: Re: question about trades
ygData.msgSnippet: ... yes, it is a dark elf ability.  it used to kill your pet, but i guess they decided to change it at the same time they changed the invis vs undead spell
ygData.messageBody:
>Hide skill? is this for Dark Elves only?
>
>I am a gnome L8 necro and was just wondering, thanks
>and does the "HIDE" skill kill your pet?


yes, it is a dark elf ability. it used to kill your pet, but i guess they
decided to change it at the same time they changed the 'invis vs undead'
spell killing your pet if others cast it on you. i actually used to use
hide to kill my pet if i didnt want it (i still havent bought reclaim
energy), but it doesnt work like that anymore =)

belphenor
